data.title: Biography of Alfonso III King Portugal 1210
data.meta_description: Biography of Alfonso III King Portugal 1210-1279 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
In 1206 [his father] Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal 1185-1223 (age 20) and [his mother] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 18) were married. They were second cousin once removed. She a granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She the daughter of Alfonso VIII King Castile 1155-1214 (age 50) and Eleanor Plantagenet Queen Consort Castile (age 44). He the son of Sancho "Populator" I King Portugal 1154-1211 (age 51) and Dulce Barcelona Queen Consort Portugal.

On 26 Mar 1211 [his grandfather] Sancho "Populator" I King Portugal 1154-1211 (age 56) died. On 26 Mar 1211 His son [his father] Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal 1185-1223 (age 25) succeeded II King Portugal. [his mother] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 23) by marriage Queen Consort Portugal.

On 03 Nov 1220 [his mother] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 33) died.

On 25 Mar 1223 [his father] Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal 1185-1223 (age 37) died at Coimbra. His son [his brother] Sancho "Pious" II King Portugal 1209-1248 (age 13) succeeded II King Portugal.

In 1239 Alfonso III King Portugal (age 28) and Matilda Dammartin Queen Consort Portugal (age 37) were married. They were third cousin once removed. He a great grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King William "Conqueror" I of England 1028-1087. She by marriage Queen Consort Portugal. She the daughter of Renaud Dammartin I Count Boulogne, Dammartin and Aumale and Ida Metz Countess Boulogne 1160-1216. He the son of Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal 1185-1223 and Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal.

On 04 Jan 1248 [his brother] Sancho "Pious" II King Portugal 1209-1248 (age 38) died. His brother Alfonso III King Portugal (age 37) succeeded III King Portugal.

Around 1250 [his illegitimate son] Martim Afonso Chichorro Burgundy was born illegitimately to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 39) and Madragana Ben Aloandro (age 20).

In 1253 Alfonso III King Portugal (age 42) and Matilda Dammartin Queen Consort Portugal (age 51) were divorced.

In 1253 Alfonso III King Portugal (age 42) and Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 11) were married. They were first cousin twice removed. He a great grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She by marriage Queen Consort Portugal. The difference in their ages was 31 years. She the daughter of Alfonso X King Castile X King Leon (age 31) and Mayor Guillén de Guzmán (age 48). He the son of Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal 1185-1223 and Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal.

In Jan 1259 [his wife] Matilda Dammartin Queen Consort Portugal (age 57) died.

On 25 Feb 1259 [his daughter] Blanche Burgundy was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 48) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 17).

Around 1260 [his illegitimate daughter] Urraca Afonso Burgundy was born illegitimately to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 49) and Madragana Ben Aloandro (age 30).

Around 1260 [his illegitimate son] Afonso Dinis Burgundy was born illegitimately to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 49) and Maria Peres Enxara.

In 1260 [his son] Ferdinand Burgundy was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 49) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 18).

On 09 Oct 1261 [his son] Denis I King Portugal 1261-1325 was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 51) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 19). Denis I King Portugal 1261-1325 succeeded I King Portugal.

In 1262 [his son] Ferdinand Burgundy (age 2) died.

On 08 Feb 1263 [his son] Afonso Burgundy was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 52) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 21).

On 02 Feb 1264 [his daughter] Sancha Burgundy was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 53) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 22).

On 21 Nov 1264 [his daughter] Maria Burgundy was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 54) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 22).

In 1266 [his daughter] Constanza Burgundy was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 55) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 24).

In 1268 [his son] Vincent Burgundy was born to Alfonso III King Portugal (age 57) and [his wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 26).

In Nov 1269 [his brother-in-law] Ferdinand de la Cerda Ivrea (age 14) and Blanche Capet (age 16) were married. They were second cousin once removed. He a great x 3 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She a great x 2 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She the daughter of King Louis IX of France (age 55) and Margaret Provence Queen Consort France (age 48). He the son of Alfonso X King Castile X King Leon (age 47) and Violante Barcelona Queen Consort Castile Queen Consort Leon.

In 1271 [his son] Vincent Burgundy (age 3) died.

In 1271 [his daughter] Constanza Burgundy (age 5) died.

In 1275 [his sister-in-law] Eleanor Ivrea (age 18) died.

On 25 Jul 1275 [his brother-in-law] Ferdinand de la Cerda Ivrea (age 19) died.

On 16 Feb 1279 Alfonso III King Portugal (age 68) died.

On 27 Oct 1303 [his former wife] Beatrice Queen Consort Portugal (age 61) died.

Philip Capet Count Boulogne 1200-1234 and Matilda Dammartin Queen Consort Portugal were married. They were third cousins. He a great x 3 grandson of King William "Conqueror" I of England 1028-1087. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King William "Conqueror" I of England 1028-1087. She the daughter of Renaud Dammartin I Count Boulogne, Dammartin and Aumale and Ida Metz Countess Boulogne 1160-1216. He the son of King Philip II of France and Agnes Andechs Queen Consort France.
